titles.title: Airport Recycling Act of 2000
To amend title 49, United States Code, to encourage airports to develop and implement recycling programs for newspapers and other recyclable items.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/8/2000--Introduced. Airport Recycling Act of 2000 - Amends Federal transportation law to make recycling programs for newspapers and other recyclable items an airport development activity, for which an airport improvement project may receive a grant. Declares it is U.S. policy that airports should develop and implement such programs.
